epfl.lsr.bachelor.project.store

Class KeyValueStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • epfl.lsr.bachelor.project.store.KeyValueStore
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConcurrentArrayKeyValueStore, ConcurrentKeyValueStore, HandMadeConcurrentKeyValueStore, NormalKeyValueStore

    public abstract class KeyValueStore
extends java.lang.Object
    This interface enables to dynamically use different types of implementations for the Key-Value store
    Author:
    Gregory Maitre & Patrick Andrade

           Value<?> value)
        Enables to associate some value to some key
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        value - the value to be associated to the key
        Returns:

      • remove

        public abstract Value<?> remove(java.lang.String key)
        Enables to remove the mapping for a key
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        Returns:
        the value to which this map previously associated the key, or null if the map contained no mapping for the key.
